plot: A rag to riches profile of a Holocaust survivor born in Romania and living in New York where she worked as the Commisioner of Mayor Guliani to the United Nations and owns one of the biggest collection of Marc Chagall in the world.
title: Livia S. Sylva: A Woman Against the Odds
plot_es: A rag to riches profile of a Holocaust survivor born in Romania and living in New York where she worked as the Commisioner of Mayor Guliani to the United Nations and owns one of the biggest collection of Marc Chagall in the world.
original_name: Livia S. Sylva: A Woman Against the Odds
